titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6061) to establish operational control over the international land and maritime borders of the United States.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-653, by Mr. Sessions.
The amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 227.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1002.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 190 (Roll no. 444).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/14/2006--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 6061 (Secure Fence Act of 2006).
